articles.title: Breast Cancer Diagnosed With Near 100% Accuracy Using AI System - Technology Networks
articles.description: Scientists have developed a new AI architecture designed to detect breast cancer that the researchers say has achieved an accuracy rate of 99.72%.
articles.content:
Earlier this year, Northeastern University researchers unveiled a web-based artificial intelligence tool designed to diagnose prostate cancer at a faster and more accurate rate. 
Now, the same group… [+2283 chars]

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Series Launch Confirmed; Next Galaxy Unpacked to Be Held on July 10 | Technology News - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Samsung has announced the date for its second Galaxy Unpacked event for 2024. The company is expected to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6 foldables at the event. We could also see Samsung take wraps off a new tablet lineup, Galaxy Watch 7 series…

articles.title: Google brings its Gemini AI to Gmail to help you write and summarize emails - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is rolling a new Gemini side panel in Gmail that can help you write emails and summarize email threads.
articles.content: Google is rolling out a new Gemini AI side panel in Gmail that can help you write emails and summarize email threads. The company is also adding the Gemini side panel to Docs, Sheets, Slides and Driv… [+2419 chars]
